user_query: I am hosting a crime-themed event and need access to police news articles.

TaskList.description: Retrieve police news articles from the 'tag24' news source using the German Police and Crime News Live API.
Extract messages and information from the retrieved police news articles.
Fetch movie news articles related to the superhero 'Superman' using the Kubric API.
Share the titles and snippets from the fetched movie news articles.
